text: hananim-i seongseoeseo gyesihan geos-eul gamchugo hajalgeos-eobsneun geos-eul eodgoja haneun ja geudeul-eun geuui bogjung e yuhwangbul-eul samkineun geosgwa gat-eumyeo buhwal-ui nal hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege malhaji anhgo geudeul-eul sunhwasikyeojuji do anh-eusini geudeul-egen eomhan beol-i iss-eul ppun-ila
